problems.title: Problems We Solve
problems.intro: Kin Relay addresses the real-world pain points faced by families, informal caregivers, and professional care teams:

fragmented.title: Fragmented Communication
fragmented.text: Care teams and families often rely on WhatsApp, paper notes, or memory, leading to missed information, duplicated tasks, and confusion during handovers.

missed.title: Missed Medications & Tasks
missed.text: Without structured reminders and logs, medication doses, meals, or important care tasks are easily forgotten, risking well-being.

burnout.title: Burnout for Informal Carers
burnout.text: Family caregivers experience stress and burnout due to lack of coordination, unclear responsibilities, and no easy way to share updates or ask for help.

handover.title: Unstructured Handover
handover.text: Shift changes are prone to errors when information isn't transferred clearly—leading to missed incidents, hydration gaps, or incomplete records.

privacy.title: Privacy & Compliance Risks
privacy.text: Generic chat apps or paper logs expose sensitive data to privacy breaches and non-compliance.

language.title: Language Barriers
language.text: Multilingual teams struggle when tools aren't available in their preferred language.

problems.outro: Kin Relay solves these with structured, privacy-first logging, one-tap handover reports, reminders, multilingual support, and secure EU-based data handling.

qa.title: Q&A
qa.getting_started: Sign up, invite your care circle, and start logging.

what.a: Kin Relay is a care coordination platform for families and professional carers, offering web, Android, and admin tools.

who.a: Families, informal caregivers, professional care teams and providers.

medical.q: Is Kin Relay a medical device?
medical.a: No. It focuses on documentation, reminders and handovers—not diagnostics or treatment.

privacy.q: Is my data private and secure?
privacy.a: Yes. EU hosting, explicit consent flows and GDPR/TDDDG compliance.

platforms.a: Web app, Android app and an admin dashboard.

export.a: Yes. Generate daily or shift PDFs or send by email.

languages.q: Is it available in my language?

invite.a: Invite by email inside the app and assign roles.

android.q: What does the Android app do?
android.a: Log activities, set reminders and complete handovers on the go.

difference.q: How is it different from chat apps?
difference.a: Structured logs, privacy controls and one‑tap reports vs unstructured chat.

free.a: Yes. A free family tier is available.

support.a: Via in‑app support or the contact form.

accessibility.a: High contrast, fluid type and reduced motion options.

getting_started.a: Sign up, invite your circle and start logging right away.
